features.name: Authentication
features.description: Login and Signup functionality with Email/Password and Social Login UI. Handles user sessions and redirects.

features.name: Navigation & Layout
features.description: App shell with glassmorphism header and bottom navigation. Adaptive layouts based on user roles (Pastor, Leader, Member).

features.name: Progress Tracking
features.description: Dashboard for viewing reading progress, streaks, weekly activity, and achievements.

features.name: Cell Management
features.description: Leader capabilities to manage cell members and view cell details. Admin capabilities for Pastors.

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Push notification subscription and bell icon UI.
